thread.section_title: Science News and Analysis - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Italy’s Slow Climb Out of Recession, in 12 Charts

author: Eric Sylvers
title: Italy’s Slow Climb Out of Recession, in 12 Charts
text:
The global financial crisis and the eurozone debt meltdown that followed hit Italy particularly hard. The economy has begun to grow again, but as Italians go to the polls Sunday, it remains the only member of the Group of Seven leading industrial nations whose economy is still smaller than its precrisis size.
Helped by the fastest European...
